ygData.subject: Re: Exciting News!
ygData.msgSnippet: As I am a master potter as well as a master smith, I am on both trade skill lists.  Anyhow, there is a large buzz going on in the pottery list that I would
ygData.messageBody:
As I am a master potter as well as a master smith, I am on both trade skill
lists. Anyhow, there is a large buzz going on in the pottery list that I
would like to share with all the other smiths out there!

In the OoT (I do not know where yet), there is a merchant that is selling
WEAPON SKETCHES! I believe that these sketches and proper ingredients, when
propery formed at the wheel and burned at the kiln, form weapon molds!
FINALLY! Maybe soon we will be selling weapons alongside our banded armor!

If anyone else has any info, please share it. Thanks all!

Haijar the Mage Blacksmith
